metadata.title: CVE-2024-8376 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In Eclipse Mosquitto up to version 2.0.18a, an attacker can achieve memoryleaking, segmentation fault or heap-use-after-free by sending specificsequences of "CONNECT", "DISCONNECT", "SUBSCRIBE", "UNSUBSCRIBE" and"PUBLISH" packets.

criterions.comment: mosquitto package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
